body.name: KOORUI 60% Gaming Keyboards, 61 Keys Wired Ultra-Compact Mechanical Keyboard 26 RGB Backlit with Red Switch Mini Keyboards for Windows MacOS Linux
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: [61 Keys with Gorgeous Backlighting] The 60% gaming keyboard can save desk space. The detachable Type-C cable and small size make it easy to carry around for home/office use or business trips. It offers 26 backlighting modes with RGB effects, providing over 16 million color combinations to personalize your keyboard's appearance.

[Hot-Swappable Switches] The 61 Keys mechanical keyboard comes with six extra switches (two each of red, brown, and blue) for you to try different switch types and enrich your typing experience. Additionally, the double-shot injection keycaps are fade-resistant and long-lasting.

[Anti-Ghosting Technology]Full-key anti-ghosting technology ensures that every keystroke is registered, and even when multiple keys are pressed at the same time, the keyboard's super-responsive speed keeps up with your best moves, allowing you to enjoy a seamless, uninterrupted gaming experience and help you win games

[Multi-Functionality and Compatibility] The mini keyboard features 12 multi-function keys for convenient multimedia control, including volume adjustment and media playback. It is compatible with both Apple and Microsoft operating systems, and the multi-function combination keys are also compatible

[KOORUI SERVICES] KOORUI provide high-quality gamer keyboard and premium services, included 12 months warranty. If you find any damage, malfunction or missing accessories, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gaming keyboard
reviews.reviewText: My son got this for his Xbox to play games via keyboard versus controller. He really loves it! The size is perfect, it is on the smaller size and not bulky so it doesn’t take up too much space! The lights add a fun aspect as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: This is the best mechanical keyboard at this price point. I purchased the one with red switches, and it types very smoothly. I prefer this switch for both gaming and coding. The fact that you can also swap the switches if necessary is amazing. I kind of wish there was some sort of knob or slider for the volume and maybe some stand at the back to give it a tilt, but at the same time, these are just minor issues. It is more ergonomic to type it flat anyways. The lighting could use a bit more variety (different patterns). I would've preferred an option to keep it solid. There is only a breathing pattern where one color flashes or the rainbow effect where the keys cycle different colors to the right. I will definitely not hesitate to buy this same keyboard again if the one I currently have needs a replacement somewhere down the line. I used a Razer mechanical keyboard with blue switches and other more expensive mechanical keyboard brands from China before this one, which cost quadruple the price of this one... I ended up liking the feel of this one most, so that definitely speaks volumes.

Very solid mechanical keyboard. I'd say it competes with the likes of Corsair and Razer. I'm unsure how the product will hold up in the long term compared to a big brand name but it works well, has alot of very cool lighting effects. It's very worth the price even only having had it for a couple weeks now, I would recommend. It also comes with a keycap/switch puller, and a few extra switches (2 brown, 2 red, 2 blue) just so you can test them out, and maybe replace the switches if one ever decided to give out, or if you want a different feel out of specific keys. For example, I put blue switches on my spacebar, and shift keys, just to help discern which keys I'm on while gaming. Solid 5 stars.
My son is extremely happy with it.
